price: Do you not see that We sent devils against the disbelievers constantly inciting them to sin?
arabic: أَلَمۡ تَرَ أَنَّآ أَرۡسَلۡنَا ٱلشَّيَٰطِينَ عَلَى ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ تَؤُزُّهُمۡ أَزّٗا

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
